Grown using sustainable, traditional farming practices, our Barnyard Millet is chemical-free, unpolished, sun-dried, and handled with care â€” right from seed to sack â€” so you get a grain thatâ€™s as natural as the soil it comes from.

This lesser-known but highly nutritious millet is a perfect addition to modern diets. With its high fiber content, low glycemic index, and rich mineral profile, Barnyard Millet is a superfood that helps you stay full, energized, and healthy throughout the day.

ğŸš How to Use Oodalu in Your Kitchen:
Oodalu cooks quickly and easily â€” just like rice! Use it to make upma, pongal, khichdi, pulao, or even sweet dishes like payasam (kheer). It also makes a great base for gluten-free porridge, rotis, or snacks like millet tikki and cheela.

Quick Tip: Soak the millet for 30 minutes before cooking for a softer texture and better nutrient absorption.
